be.adaxisoft.bencode

Class BEncodedValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.adaxisoft.bencode.BEncodedValue

  • public class BEncodedValue
extends Object
    A type-agnostic container for B-encoded values.
    Author:
    mpetazzoni

      • getString

        public String getString()
                 throws InvalidBEncodingException
        Returns this BEValue as a String, interpreted as UTF-8.
        Throws:
        InvalidBEncodingException - If the value is not a byte[].

      • getString

        public String getString(String encoding)
                 throws InvalidBEncodingException
        Returns this BEValue as a String, interpreted with the specified encoding.
        Parameters:
        encoding - The encoding to interpret the bytes as when converting them into a String.
        Throws:
        InvalidBEncodingException - If the value is not a byte[].

      • getMap

        public Map<String,BEncodedValue> getMap()
                                 throws InvalidBEncodingException
        Returns this BEValue as a Map of String keys and BEValue values.
        Throws:
        InvalidBEncodingException - If the value is not a HashMap.
